mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sls.mapper.SlsPrfmncMapper.selectSlsPrfmnc */ SP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SP.SLS_YMD AS SLS_YMD , SP.SLS_SN AS SLS_SN , SP.SLS_YMD || SP.SLS_SN AS SLSNO , SP.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , SP.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , SP.SPCFCT_CD AS SPCFCT_CD , SP.GDS_CD AS GDS_CD , SP.CNPT_CD AS CNPT_CD , SP.BRND_NM AS BRND_NM , SP.SPMT_YMD AS SPMT_YMD , SP.SLS_UNTPRC AS SLS_UNTPRC , SP.QNTT AS QNTT , SP.WGHT AS WGHT , SP.CFMTN_AMT AS CFMTN_AMT , SP.CFMTN_YN AS CFMTN_YN , SP.CLCTM_YN AS CLCTM_YN , SP.RKNG_AMT AS RKNG_AMT , SP.SPMTNO AS SPMTNO , SP.PCKGNO AS PCKGNO , SP.PCKG_SN AS PCKG_SN FROM TB_SLS_PRFMNC SP WHERE SP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SP.SPMTNO = #{spmtno} AND SP.PCKGNO = #{pckgno} AND SP.PCKG_SN = #{pckgSn}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sls.mapper.SlsPrfmncMapper.selectSlsPrfmncCfmtnYn */ COUNT(*) AS SLS_PRFMNC_QNTT , CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN SP.CFMTN_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CFMTN_YN FROM TB_SLS_PRFMNC SP WHERE SP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SP.SPMTNO = #{spmtno}
